## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3706">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3706">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3707">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3707">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3708">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3708">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3709">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3709">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3710">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3710">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3711">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3711">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3712">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3712">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3713">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3713">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3714">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3714">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3715">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3715">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3716">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3716">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3717">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3717">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3718">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3718">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3719">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3719">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3720">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3720">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3721">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3722">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3722">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3723">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3724">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3724">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3725">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3725">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3726">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3726">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3727">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3727">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3728">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3728">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3761">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3761">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3762">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3762">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3764">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3764">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3765">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3766">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3766">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3768">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3768">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3770">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3771">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3771">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3772">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3772">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3787">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3787">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3788">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3789">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3789">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3790">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3791">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3791">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3792">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3793">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3793">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-3794">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-3795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3796">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3796">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3797">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3797">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3798">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3798">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3799">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3799">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3800">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3800">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3801">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3801">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3802">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3802">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-3803">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-3803">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4249">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4249">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4250">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4250">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4251">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4251">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4252">10个数字和包含连字符的字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4252">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4253">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4253">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4254">10个数字和包含连字符的字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4254">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4255">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4255">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4256">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4256">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4257">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4257">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4258">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4258">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4259">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4260">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4260">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4261">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4262">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4263">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4263">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4264">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4264">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4395">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4395">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4396">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4396">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4397">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4397">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4398">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4398">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4399">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4399">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4400">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4400">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4401">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4401">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4402">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4402">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4403">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4403">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4404">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4404">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4405">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4405">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4406">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4406">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4407">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4407">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4408">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4408">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4409">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4409">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4410">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4410">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4411">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4411">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4412">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4412">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4413">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4413">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4414">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4414">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4432">芬兰国家/地区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4432">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4433">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4434">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4434">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4435">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4435">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4436">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4436">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4437">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4437">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4438">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4438">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4439">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4439">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4440">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4440">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4441">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4442">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4442">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4443">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4444">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4444">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4445">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4445">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4446">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4446">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4447">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4447">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4448">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4448">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4449">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4449">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4450">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4450">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4499">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4499">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4500">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4500">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4501">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4501">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4502">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4502">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4503">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4503">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4504">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4504">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4505">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4505">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4506">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4506">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4507">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4508">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4508">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4509">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4510">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4510">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4511">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4511">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4512">找到 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 或 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4512">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4533">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4533">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4534">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4534">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4535">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4536">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4536">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4537">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4538">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4538">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4539">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4539">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4540">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4540">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4541">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4541">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4542">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4542">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4543">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4543">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4544">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4544">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4545">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4545">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4546">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4547">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4547">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4548">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4549">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4549">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4550">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4550">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4551">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4551">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4552">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4553">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4553">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4577">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4577">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4578">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4578">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4579">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4579">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4580">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4580">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4581">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4581">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4582">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4582">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4583">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4583">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4584">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4584">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4585">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4585">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4586">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4587">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4587">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4588">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4588">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4716">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4716">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4717">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4717">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4718">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4718">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4719">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4719">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4720">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4720">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4721">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4721">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4722">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4723">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4723">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4724">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4725">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4725">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4726">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4726">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4727">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4727">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4728">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4728">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4729">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4729">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4730">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4730">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4732">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4732">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4734">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4735">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4735">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4736">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4736">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4737">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4737">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4738">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4738">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4739">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4739">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4740">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4740">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4741">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4741">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4742">法国国家 id 卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4742">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4743">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4744">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4744">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4745">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4746">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4746">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4747">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4748">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4748">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4749">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4750">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4750">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4751">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4751">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4752">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4752">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4754">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4754">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4759">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4759">cni</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4761">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4761">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4762">国家标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4762">national identity</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4766">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4766">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4767">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4767">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4768">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4768">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4769">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4769">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4770">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4770">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4771">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4771">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4772">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4772">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4773">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4773">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4774">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4774">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4775">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4776">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4776">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4777">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4778">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4778">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4779">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4779">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4780">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4780">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4781">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4781">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4782">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4782">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4783">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4783">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4784">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4784">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4785">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4785">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4786">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4786">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4787">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4787">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4788">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4788">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4789">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4789">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4790">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4790">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4791">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4791">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4792">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4792">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4793">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4793">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4794">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4794">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4795">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4795">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4796">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4796">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4797">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4797">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4798">Passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4798">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4799">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4799">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4800">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4800">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4801">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4801">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4802">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4802">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4803">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4803">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4804">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4804">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4805">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4805">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4806">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4806">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4807">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4807">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4808">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4808">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4809">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4809">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4813">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4814">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4814">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4815">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4815">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4816">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4816">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4817">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4818">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4818">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4819">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4819">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4820">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4820">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4821">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4821">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4846">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4846">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4848">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4848">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4849">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4850">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4850">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4851">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4851">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4852">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4852">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4853">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4853">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4854">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4854">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4855">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4855">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4856">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4856">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4857">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4857">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4858">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4858">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4859">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4859">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4860">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4860">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4861">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4861">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4862">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4862">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4863">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4863">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4864">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4864">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4865">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4865">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4866">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4866">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4867">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4867">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4868">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4868">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4888">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4888">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4889">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4890">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4891">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4892">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4893">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4894">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4896">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4896">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4898">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4898">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4899">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4899">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4900">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4900">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4901">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4901">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4902">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4902">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4903">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4903">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4904">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4904">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4905">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4905">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4906">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4906">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4907">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4907">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4908">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4908">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4909">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4909">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4910">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4910">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4911">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4911">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4912">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4912">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4913">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4913">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4914">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4914">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4915">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4915">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4928">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4928">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4929">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4929">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4930">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4931">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4931">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4932">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4932">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4933">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4933">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4934">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4934">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4935">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4935">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4939">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4940">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4940">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-4941">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-4942">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4943">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4943">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4944">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4944">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-4945">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-4945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5094">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5094">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5095">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5096">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5096">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5097">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5097">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5098">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5098">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5099">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5099">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5100">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5100">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5101">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5101">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5102">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5102">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5103">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5103">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5104">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5104">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5105">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5105">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5106">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5106">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5107">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5108">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5108">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5109">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5109">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5110">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5110">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5111">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5111">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5112">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5112">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5113">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5113">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5114">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5114">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5115">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5115">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5116">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5116">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5117">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5117">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5118">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5118">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5119">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5119">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5120">个人 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5120">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5121">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5121">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5122">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5122">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5123">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5123">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5124">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5124">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5125">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5125">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5126">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5126">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5128">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5128">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5129">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5130">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5130">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5131">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5131">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5132">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5132">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5133">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5133">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5134">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5134">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5135">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5135">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5136">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5136">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5137">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5137">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5138">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5138">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5139">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5139">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5140">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5140">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5141">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5141">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5142">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5143">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5143">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5144">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5144">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5145">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5145">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5146">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5146">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5148">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5148">reisepasse</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5150">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5150">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5151">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5151">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5152">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5152">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5153">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5153">Passnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5154">reisepässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5154">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5155">passeport。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5155">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5156">passeport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5156">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5157">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5157">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5158">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5158">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5159">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5159">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5160">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5160">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5161">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5161">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5162">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5162">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5163">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5163">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5164">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5164">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5165">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5165">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5166">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5166">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5167">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5167">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5168">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5168">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5169">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5169">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5170">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5171">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5171">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5172">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5173">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5173">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5174">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5174">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5175">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5175">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5176">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5177">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5177">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
