## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5203">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5203">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5204">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5204">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5205">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5205">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5206">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5206">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5207">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5207">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5208">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5208">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5209">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5209">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5211">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5211">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5212">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5213">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5213">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5214">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5214">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5215">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5215">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5216">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5216">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5217">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5217">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5218">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5218">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5219">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5220">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5220">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5221">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5221">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5222">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5223">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5223">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5224">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5226">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5226">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5227">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5227">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5228">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5229">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5229">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5230">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5230">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5231">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5231">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5232">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5232">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5233">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5233">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5234">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5234">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5235">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5235">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5236">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5236">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5237">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5237">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5238">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5238">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5239">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5239">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5240">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5240">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5242">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5242">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5243">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5244">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5246">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5246">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5248">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5248">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5249">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5249">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5250">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5376">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5376">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5377">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5378">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5378">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5379">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5380">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5380">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5381">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5381">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5382">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5382">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5383">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5383">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5384">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5384">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5385">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5385">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5386">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5386">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5387">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5387">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5388">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5388">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5389">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5389">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5390">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5390">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5391">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5391">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5392">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5392">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5393">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5393">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5394">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5394">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5395">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5395">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5400">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5400">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5401">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5401">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5402">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5402">identity card</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5406">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5406">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5407">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5407">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5409">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5409">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5411">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5411">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5412">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5413">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5413">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5414">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5415">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5415">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5416">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5416">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5417">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5417">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5434">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5434">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5435">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5435">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5436">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5436">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5437">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5437">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5438">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5438">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5439">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5439">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5440">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5440">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5441">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5441">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5442">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5442">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5443">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5443">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5444">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5444">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5445">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5446">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5446">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5447">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5448">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5448">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5449">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5449">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5450">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5450">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5479">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5479">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5480">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5480">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5481">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5481">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5482">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5482">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5483">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5483">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5484">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5484">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5485">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5485">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5486">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5486">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5487">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5487">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5488">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5488">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5489">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5489">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5490">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5491">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5491">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5492">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5492">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5493">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5494">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5494">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5495">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5495">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5496">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5536">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5536">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5537">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5537">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5539">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5539">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5541">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5541">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5542">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5542">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5543">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5543">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5544">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5545">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5546">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5547">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5547">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5548">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5548">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5549">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5674">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5674">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5675">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5675">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5676">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5676">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5677">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5677">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5678">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5678">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5679">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5679">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5680">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5680">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5681">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5682">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5682">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5683">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5684">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5684">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5685">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5685">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5686">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5686">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5687">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5687">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5688">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5688">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5689">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5690">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5691">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5692">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5692">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5693">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5693">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5694">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5694">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5696">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5696">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5701">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5701">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5702">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5702">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5703">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5703">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5704">ig。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5704">sz.ig.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5706">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5706">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5707">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5707">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5708">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5708">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5709">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5709">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5710">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5710">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5711">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5711">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5712">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5712">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5714">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5714">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5716">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5716">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5717">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5717">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5718">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5718">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5735">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5735">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5736">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5736">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5737">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5737">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5738">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5738">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5739">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5739">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5740">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5740">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5741">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5742">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5742">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5743">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5744">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5745">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5745">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5746">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5746">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5747">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5747">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5748">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5748">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5768">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5768">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5769">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5769">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5770">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5770">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5771">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5771">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5772">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5772">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5773">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5773">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5774">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5774">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5776">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5776">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5777">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5778">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5778">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5779">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5779">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5780">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5780">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5781">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5781">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5782">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5783">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5783">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5784">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5785">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5785">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5786">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5786">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5787">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5787">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5788">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5788">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5789">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5789">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5815">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5815">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5816">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5817">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5818">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5819">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5820">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5821">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5822">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5823">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5823">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5824">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5825">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5825">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5826">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5826">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5827">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5827">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5828">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5828">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5829">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5830">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5831">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5832">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5833">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5833">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5834">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5834">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5835">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5835">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5836">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5836">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5850"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5850">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5851">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5851">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5852">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5852">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5853">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5853">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5854">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5854">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5855">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5855">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5856">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J 和 G (中的字母不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5856">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5857">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5857">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5858">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5858">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5859">字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5859">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5860">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5860">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5861">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5861">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5862">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5862">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5863">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5863">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5864">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5864">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5865">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5865">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5866">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5867">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5867">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5868">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5868">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5869">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5869">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5870">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5870">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5871">蛋糕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5871">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5872">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5872">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5873">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5873">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5874">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5874">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5875">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5875">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5876">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5876">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5877">一个不为0或1的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5877">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5878">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5878">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5879">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5879">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5880">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5880">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5881">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5881">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5882">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5882">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5883">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5884">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5884">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5885">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5886">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5887">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5887">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5888">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5888">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5889">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5889">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5890">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5890">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5891">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5891">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5892">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5892">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5894">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5894">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5895">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5895">aadhaar</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5897">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5897">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5898">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5898">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5899">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5899">आधार</span></span>
