## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5901">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5901">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5903">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5903">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5904">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5905">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5905">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5906">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5906">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5907">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5907">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5908">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5908">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5909">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5909">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5910">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5910">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5911">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5911">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5912">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5912">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5913">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5913">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5914">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5914">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5915">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5915">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5916">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5916">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5917">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5917">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5918">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5918">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5919">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5919">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5920">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5920">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5921">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5921">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5922">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5922">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5923">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5923">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5924">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5924">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5925"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5925">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5926">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5926">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5927">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5927">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5928">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5928">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5929">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5929">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5930">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5930">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5931">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5931">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5932">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5932">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5933">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5933">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5936">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5936">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5937">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5938">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5938">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5939">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5940">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5941">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5941">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5942">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5942">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5943">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5943">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5944">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5944">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5945">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5945">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5946">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5946">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5947">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5947">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5948">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5948">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5949">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5949">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5950">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5950">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5951">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5951">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5952">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5952">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5953">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5953">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5954">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5954">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5955">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5955">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5956">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5956">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5957">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5957">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5958">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5958">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5959">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5959">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5960">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5960">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5961">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5961">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5962">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5962">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5963">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5963">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5964">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5965">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5965">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5966">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5967">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5967">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5968">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5969">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5969">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5970">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5971">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5971">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5972">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5972">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5973">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5973">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5974">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5974">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5975">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5975">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5976">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5976">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5977">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5977">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5978">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5978">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5979">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5979">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5980">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5980">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5981">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5981">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5982">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5982">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5983">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5983">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5984">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5984">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5985">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5985">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5986"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5986">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5987">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5987">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5988">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5989">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5989">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-5990">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5991">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5991">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5992">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5992">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5993">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5993">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5994">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5994">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5995">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5995">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5996">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5996">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-5997">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5997">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5998">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5998">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-5999">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-5999">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6000">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6000">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6001">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6001">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6002">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6002">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6003">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6003">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6004">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6004">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6005">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6005">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6006">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6006">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6007">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6007">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6008">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6008">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6009">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6010">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6010">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6011">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6012">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6012">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6013">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6013">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6014">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6014">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6015">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6016">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6016">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6017">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6018">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6018">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6019">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6019">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6020">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6020">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6143">ceadúnais tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6143">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6144">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6144">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6145">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6145">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6146">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6146">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6147">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6147">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6148">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6148">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6149">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6149">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6150">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6150">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6151">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6151">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6152">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6152">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6153">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6153">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6154">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6154">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6155">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6155">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6156">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6156">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6157">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6157">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6178">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6178">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6180">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6180">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6181">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6181">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6182">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6182">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6183">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6183">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6184">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6184">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6185">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6185">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6186">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6186">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6187">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6187">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6188">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6188">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6189">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6189">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6190">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6190">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6191">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6191">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6193">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6193">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6196">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6196">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6197">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6197">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6198">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6198">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6199">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6199">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6200">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6200">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6201">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6246">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6246">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6247">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6248">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6248">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6249">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6250">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6250">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6251">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6251">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6252">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6252">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6253">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6253">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6254">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6254">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6255">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6255">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6256">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6256">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6257">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6257">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6258">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6258">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6259">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6259">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6260">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6260">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6261">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6261">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6262">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6262">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6263">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6263">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6264">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6264">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6265">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6265">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6266">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6266">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6267">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6267">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6268">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6268">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6269">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6269">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6270">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6270">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6271">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6271">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6272">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6272">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6273">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6273">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6274">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6274">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6275">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6275">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6276">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6276">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6277">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6277">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6278">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6279">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6279">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6280">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6280">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6281">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6281">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6300">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6300">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6301">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6301">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6302">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6303">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6303">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6304">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6305">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6305">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6306">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6306">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6307">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6307">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6308">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6309">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6309">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6310">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6311">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6311">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6312">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6313">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6314">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6314">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6315">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6315">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6316">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6316">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6317">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6317">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6318">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6318">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6319">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6319">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6320">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6320">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6321">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6321">patenti di guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6322">patenti guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6322">patenti guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6323">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6323">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6324">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6324">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6325">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6325">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6326">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6326">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6327">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6327">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6328">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6328">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6329">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6329">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6330">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6331">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6331">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6332">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6333">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6333">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6334">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6334">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6335">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6335">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6336">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6336">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6337">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6337">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6338">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6338">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6339">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6339">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6340">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6340">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6342">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6342">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6344">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6344">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6345">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6345">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6346">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6346">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6347">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6347">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6348">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6348">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6383">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6383">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6384">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6384">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6385">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6385">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6386">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6386">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6387">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6387">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6388">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6388">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6389">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6389">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6390">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6390">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6391">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6392">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6392">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6393">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6394">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6394">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6395">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6395">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6396">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6417">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6417">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6418">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6419">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6420">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6421">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6422">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6423">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6424">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6425">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6425">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6426">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6427">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6427">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6428">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6428">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6429">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6429">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6430">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6430">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6431">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6431">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6432">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6433">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6433">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6434">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6435">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6436">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6436">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6437">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6437">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6438">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6438">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6439">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6439">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6447">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6447">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6448">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6449">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6449">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6450">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6451">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6451">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6452">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6452">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6453">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6453">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6454">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6454">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6455">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6455">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6456">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6456">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6457">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6458">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6458">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6459">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6460">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6460">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6461">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6461">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6462">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6462">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6463">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6463">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6464">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6464">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6465">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6465">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6467">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6467">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6468">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6468">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6515">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6515">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6516">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6517">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6517">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6518">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6519">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6519">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6520">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6521">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6522">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6523">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6523">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6524">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6524">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6525">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6525">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6563">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6563">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6564">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6564">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6565">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6565">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6566">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6566">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6567">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6567">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6568">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6568">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6569">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6569">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6570">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6570">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6571">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6571">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6572">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6572">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6573">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6573">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6574">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6574">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6575">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6575">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6576">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6576">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6577">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6577">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6578">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6578">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6579">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6579">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6580">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6580">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6581">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6581">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6582">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6582">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6583">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6583">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6597">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6597">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6598">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6598">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6599">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6599">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6602">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6602">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6603">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6604">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6604">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6605">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6605">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6608">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6608">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6609">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6609">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6610">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6610">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6611">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6611">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6612">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6613">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6613">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6614">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6615">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6615">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6616">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6616">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6617">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6617">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6618">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6618">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6619">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6619">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6632">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6632">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6633">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6633">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6634">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6634">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6635">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6635">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6636">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6636">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6637">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6638">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6638">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6639">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6640">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6640">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6641">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6641">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6642">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6642">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
