## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6659">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6659">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6661">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6661">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6662">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6663">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6663">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6664">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6664">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6665">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6665">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6666">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6666">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6668">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6668">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6670">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6671">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6671">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6672">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6672">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6673">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6673">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6674">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6674">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6675">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6675">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6676">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6676">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6677">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6677">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6678">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6678">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6679">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6679">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6680">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6680">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6681">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6681">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6683">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6683">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6685">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6685">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6686">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6687">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6688">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6689">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6689">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6690">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6690">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6691">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6691">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6692">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6693">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6693">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6694">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6694">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6695">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6695">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6696">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6696">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6697">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6697">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6698">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6698">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6699">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6699">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6700">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6700">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6701">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6701">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6702">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6702">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6703">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6703">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6704">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6704">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6705">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6706">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6706">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6707">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6708">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6708">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6709">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6709">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6710">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6710">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6711">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6711">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6712">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6712">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6714">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6714">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6716">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6717">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6717">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6718">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6718">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6719">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6719">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6720">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6720">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6721">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6721">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6742">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6742">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6743">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6743">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6745">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6745">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6747">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6747">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6748">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6748">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6749">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6749">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6750">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6751">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6751">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6752">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6753">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6754">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6754">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6755">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6880">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6880">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6881">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6882">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6882">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6883">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6884">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6884">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6885">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6885">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6886">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6886">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6887">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6887">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6888">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6888">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6889">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6889">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6890">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6890">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6891">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6891">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6892">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6892">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6893">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6893">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6894">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6895">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6895">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6896">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6897">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6897">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6898">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6898">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6899">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6899">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6900">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6900">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6901">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6901">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6964">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6964">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6965">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6965">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6966">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6966">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6967">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6967">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6968">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6968">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6969">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6969">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6970">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6970">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6971">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6971">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6972">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6972">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6973">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6973">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6974">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6974">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6975">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6976">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6976">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-6977">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6977">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6997">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6997">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-6998">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6998">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-6999">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-6999">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7000">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7000">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7001">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7001">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7002">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7002">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7003">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7003">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7004">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7004">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7005">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7005">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7006">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7006">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7007">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7007">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7008">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7008">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7133">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7133">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7134">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7134">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7135">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7135">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7136">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7136">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7137">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7137">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7138">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7138">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7139">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7139">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7141">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7141">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7142">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7143">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7143">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7144">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7144">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7145">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7145">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7146">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7146">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7147">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7147">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7148">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7148">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7149">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7149">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7150">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7150">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7151">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7151">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7152">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7152">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7153">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7153">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7154">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7154">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7155">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7155">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7190">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7190">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7191">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7191">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7192">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7193">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7193">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7194">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7195">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7195">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7196">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7196">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7197">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7197">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7198">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7198">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7199">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7199">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7200">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7200">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7201">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7201">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7218">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7218">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7219">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7219">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7220">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7220">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7221">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7221">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7222">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7222">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7223">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7223">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7224">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7225">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7225">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7226">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7227">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7228">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7228">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7229">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7229">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7353">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7353">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7354">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7354">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7355">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7355">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7356">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7356">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7357">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7357">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7358">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7358">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7359">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7359">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7360">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7360">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7361">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7361">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7362">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7362">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7363">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7363">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7364">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7364">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7365">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7365">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7366">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7366">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7367">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7367">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7368">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7368">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7369">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7369">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7370">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7370">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7371">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7371">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7372">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7372">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7373">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7373">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7396">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7396">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7397">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7397">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7399">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7399">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7401">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7401">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7402">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7402">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7403">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7403">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7404">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7404">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7405">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7405">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7406">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7406">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7407">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7407">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7414">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7414">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7415">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7416">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7416">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7417">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7418">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7418">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7419">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7419">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7420">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7420">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7421">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7421">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7422">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7422">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7423">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7423">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7424">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7424">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7425">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7425">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7426">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7426">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7427">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7428">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7428">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7429">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7430">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7430">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7431">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7431">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7432">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7432">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7433">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7433">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7434">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7434">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7474">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7474">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7476">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7476">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7478">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7478">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7479">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7479">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7480">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7480">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7481">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7481">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7482">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7482">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7483">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7483">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7484">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7484">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7485">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7486">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7486">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7487">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7488">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7488">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7489">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7489">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7490">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7490">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7491">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7491">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7492">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7492">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7512">mytentera</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7512">mytentera</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7513">马来西亚身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7513">malaysia identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7514">马来西亚身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7514">malaysian identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7515">nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7515">nric</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7516">个人标识卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7516">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7517">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7517">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7518">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7520">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7520">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7521">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7522">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7522">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7523">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7523">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7524">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7524">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7525">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7525">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7526">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7526">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7527">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7527">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7528">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7529">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7529">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7530">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7531">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7531">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7532">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7532">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7533">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7665">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7665">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7667">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7667">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7668">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7668">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7669">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7669">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7671">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7671">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7673">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7673">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7674">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7674">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7675">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7675">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7676">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7676">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7677">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7677">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7694">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7694">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7695">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7695">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7696">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7697">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7697">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7698">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7699">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7699">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7700">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7700">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7701">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7701">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7702">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7702">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7703">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7703">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7704">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7704">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7705">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7705">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7722">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7722">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7723">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7724">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7724">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7725">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7725">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7726">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7726">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7727">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7727">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7728">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7729">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7729">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7730">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7730">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7731">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7731">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7732">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7732">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7733">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7733">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7734">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7735">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7735">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7736">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7737">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7737">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7738">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7738">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7739">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7739">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7740">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7740">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7741">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7741">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7756">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7756">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7757">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7757">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7758">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7758">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7759">免税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7759">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7760">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7760">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7774">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7774">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7776">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7776">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7777">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7778">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7778">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7779">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7779">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7780">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7780">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7781">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7781">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7782">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7782">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7783">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7783">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7784">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7785">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7785">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7786">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7787">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7787">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7788">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7788">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7789">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7789">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7790">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7790">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7814">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7814">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7815">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7815">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7816">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7816">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7817">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7817">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7818">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7819">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7819">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7820">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7821">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7821">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7822">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7823">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7823">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7824">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7824">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7825">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7825">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7953">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7953">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7954">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7954">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7955">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7955">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7956">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7956">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7957">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7957">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7958">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7958">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7959">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7960">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7960">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7961">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7962">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7963">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7963">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7964">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7964">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7966">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7966">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7974">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7974">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7975">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7975">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7976">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7976">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7977">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7977">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7978">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7978">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7979">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7979">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7980">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7980">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7981">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7981">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7982">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7982">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7983">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7983">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7984">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7984">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7985">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7985">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7986">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7986">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-7987">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7987">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7988">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7988">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7989">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7989">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7990">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7990">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-7991">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7991">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-7992">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-7992">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
