## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8030">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8030">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8031">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8031">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8032">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8032">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8033">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8033">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8034">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8034">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8035">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8035">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8036">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8036">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8038">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8038">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8039">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8039">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8040">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8040">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8041">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8041">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8042">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8042">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8043">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8043">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8044">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8044">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8045">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8045">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8046">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8046">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8047">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8047">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8048">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8049">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8050">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8051">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8051">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8052">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8052">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8053">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8053">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8054">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8054">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8055">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8055">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8064">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8064">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8065">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8065">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8066">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8066">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8067">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8067">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8068">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8068">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8069">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8069">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8070">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8070">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8071">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8072">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8072">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8073">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8074">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8074">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8075">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8075">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8076">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8076">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8077">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8077">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8078">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8078">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8079">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8079">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8080">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8080">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8081">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8081">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8082">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8082">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8083">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8084">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8085">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8086">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8086">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8087">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8087">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8088">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8088">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8089">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8089">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8090">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8090">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8098">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8098">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8099">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8099">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8100">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8100">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8101">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8101">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8102">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8102">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8103">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8103">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8104">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8104">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8105">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8105">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8106">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8106">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8107">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8107">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8108">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8108">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8109">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8109">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8110">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8110">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8111">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8112">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8112">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8113">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8114">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8114">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8115">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8115">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8116">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8116">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8117">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8117">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8118">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8118">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8185">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8185">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8186">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8186">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8187">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8187">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8188">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8188">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8189">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8189">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8190">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8190">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8191">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8191">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8192">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8193">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8193">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8194">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8195">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8195">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8196">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8196">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8197">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8197">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8198">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8199">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8199">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8200">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8201">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8202">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8203">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8204">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8204">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8205">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8205">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8206">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8206">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8207">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8207">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8208">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8208">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8217">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8217">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8218">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8219">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8219">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8220">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8220">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8221">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8221">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8222">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8223">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8223">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8224">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8226">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8226">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8227">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8227">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8228">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8228">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8235">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8235">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8236">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8236">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8237">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8237">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8238">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8238">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8239">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8239">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8240">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8240">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8241">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8241">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8242">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8243">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8243">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8244">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8245">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8245">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8246">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8246">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8247">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8247">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8248">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8248">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8249">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8249">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8250">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8250">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8251">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8251">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8252">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8252">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8253">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8253">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8254">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8254">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8255">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8255">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8256">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8256">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8257">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8257">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8258">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8258">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8259">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8259">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8260">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8260">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8261">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8261">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8262">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8262">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8263">社会 welfare 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8263">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8264">社会 welfare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8264">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8265">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8265">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8266">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8266">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8268">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8268">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8270">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8270">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8271">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8271">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8272">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8272">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8273">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8273">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8274">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8274">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8275">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8275">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8276">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8276">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8277">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8277">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8278">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8278">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8279">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8279">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8280">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8280">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8281">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8281">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8282">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8282">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8283">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8283">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8285">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8285">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8292">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8292">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8293">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8294">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8294">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8295">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8296">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8296">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8297">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8297">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8298">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8298">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8299">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8299">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8300">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8300">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8301">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8301">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8302">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8302">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8303">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8303">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8304">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8304">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8305">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8305">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8306">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8306">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8307">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8307">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8308">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8308">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8309">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8309">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8310">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8310">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8311">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8311">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8312">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8312">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8313">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8313">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8314">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8314">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8315">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8316">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8317">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8317">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8318">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8319">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8319">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8320">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8320">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8321">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8321">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8322">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8322">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8323">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8323">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8324">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8324">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8325">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8325">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8326">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8326">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8327">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8327">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8328">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8329">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8329">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8330">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8330">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8454">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8454">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8456">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8456">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8458">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8458">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8460">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8460">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8462">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8462">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8463">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8463">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8464">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8464">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8465">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8469">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8469">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8470">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8470">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8471">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8471">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8472">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8472">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8473">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8473">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8474">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8474">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8475">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8475">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8476">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8476">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8478">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8478">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8479">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8479">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8480">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8480">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8481">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8481">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8482">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8482">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8483">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8484">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8484">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8485">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8486">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8486">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8487">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8487">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8488">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8488">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8489">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8489">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8490">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8490">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8491">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8491">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8492">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8492">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8498">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8498">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8499">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8499">nr.-pesel</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8501">器 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8501">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8504">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8504">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8505">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8505">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8507">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8507">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8509">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8509">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8510">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8511">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8511">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8512">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8513">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8513">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8514">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8514">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8515">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8515">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8516">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8516">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8517">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8517">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8518">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8518">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8523">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8523">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8524">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8524">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8525">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8525">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8526">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8526">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8527">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8527">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8528">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8528">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8529">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8529">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8530">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8530">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8531">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8531">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8532">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8532">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8533">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8533">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8534">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8534">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8535">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8535">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8536">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8536">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8537">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8537">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8538">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8539">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8539">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8540">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8541">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8541">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8542">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8542">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8543">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8543">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8544">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8544">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8545">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8545">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8563">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8563">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8564">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8564">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8565">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8565">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8566">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8566">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8567">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8567">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8568">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8568">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8569">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8570">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8570">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8571">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8571">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8572">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8572">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8573">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8574">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8574">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8575">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8576">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8576">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8577">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8577">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8578">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8578">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8608">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8608">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8609">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8609">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8610">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8610">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8611">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8611">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8612">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8612">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8613">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8613">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8614">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8614">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8615">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8615">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8616">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8616">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8617">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8617">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8618">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8618">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8638">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8638">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8639">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8639">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8640">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8640">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8641">两个模式-两个字母后跟5-8 个包含特殊字符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8641">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8642">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8642">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8643">模式1：带有特殊字符的两个字母后跟5/6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8643">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8644">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8644">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8645">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8645">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8646">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8646">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8647">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8647">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8648">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8648">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8649">模式2：一个字母后跟6/8 个数字，带有特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8649">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8650">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8650">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8651">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8651">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8652">6或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8652">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8653">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8653">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8654">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8654">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8655">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8655">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8656">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8656">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8657">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8657">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8658">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8659">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8659">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8660">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8660">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8792">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8792">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8793">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8793">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8794">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8795">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8795">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8796">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8797">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8797">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8798">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8798">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8799">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8799">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8801">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8801">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8804">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8804">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8805">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8805">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8829">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8829">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8830">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8830">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8831">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8831">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8832">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8832">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8833">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8833">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8834">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8834">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8835">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8835">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8836">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8836">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8837">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8837">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8838">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8839">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8839">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8840">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8841">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8842">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8842">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8843">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8843">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8844">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8844">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8845">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8845">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8870">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8870">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8871">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8873">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8873">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8874">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8875">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8875">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8876">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8876">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8877">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8877">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8878">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8879">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8879">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-8880">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-8881">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8882">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8882">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-8883">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-8883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9011">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9011">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9012">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9012">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9013">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9013">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9014">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9014">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9015">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9015">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9016">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9016">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9017">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9017">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9018">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9018">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9019">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9019">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9020">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9020">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9021">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9021">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9022">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9022">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9023">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9023">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9024">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9024">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9025">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9026">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9026">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9027">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9028">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9028">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9029">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9029">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9030">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9031">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9031">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9032">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9032">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9083">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9083">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9084">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9084">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9086">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9086">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9087">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9088">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9088">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9089">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9089">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9090">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9090">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9091">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9091">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9092">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9092">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9093">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9093">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9094">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9094">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
