## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9109">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9109">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9110">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9110">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9111">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9111">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9112">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9112">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9113">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9113">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9114">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9114">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9115">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9115">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9116">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9116">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9117">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9117">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9118">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9119">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9119">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9120">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9120">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9121">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9121">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9122">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9122">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9123">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9123">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9124">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9124">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9125">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9126">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9126">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9127">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9128">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9129">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9129">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9130">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9130">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9147">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9147">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9148">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9148">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9149">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9149">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9154">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9156">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9157">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9157">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9158">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9158">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9159">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9159">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9160">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9160">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9161">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9162">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9163">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9164">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9165">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9165">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9166">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9166">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9183">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9183">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9184">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9184">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9185">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9185">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9186">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9186">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9187">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9187">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9188">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9188">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9189">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9189">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9190">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9190">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9191">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9191">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9192">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9192">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9193">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9193">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9200">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9200">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9201">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9202">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9202">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9203">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9203">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9204">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9204">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9205">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9205">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9206">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9206">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9207">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9207">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9208">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9209">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9209">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9210">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9211">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9211">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9212">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9212">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9213">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9213">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9214">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9214">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9215">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9215">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9216">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9216">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9217">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9228">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9228">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9229">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9229">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9230">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9231">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9231">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9232">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9232">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9233">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9233">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9234">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9234">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9235">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9235">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9236">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9237">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9237">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9238">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9239">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9240">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9240">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9241">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9241">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9367">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9367">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9368">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9369">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9370">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9371">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9372">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9373">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9375">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9375">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9376">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9377">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9377">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9378">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9378">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9379">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9379">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9380">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9380">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9381">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9381">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9382">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9382">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9383">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9383">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9384">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9385">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9385">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9386">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9386">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9387">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9387">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9388">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9388">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9435">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9435">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9436">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9436">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9438">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9438">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9440">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9440">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9441">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9442">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9442">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9443">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9444">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9444">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9445">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9445">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9446">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9446">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9465">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9465">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9466">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9468">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9468">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9469">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9470">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9470">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9471">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9472">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9473">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9474">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9475">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9475">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9476">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9476">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9603">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9603">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9604">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9604">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9605">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9605">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9606">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9606">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9607">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9607">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9608">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9608">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9609">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9609">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9610">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9611">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9611">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9612">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9613">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9613">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9614">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9614">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9615">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9615">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9616">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9616">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9617">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9617">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9618">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9618">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9619">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9619">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9620">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9620">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9621">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9621">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9622">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9622">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9623">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9623">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9624">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9624">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9625">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9625">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9653">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9653">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9654">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9654">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9655">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9656">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9656">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9657">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9658">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9658">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9659">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9659">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9660">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9660">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9661">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9661">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9662">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9663">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9663">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9664">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9665">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9665">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9666">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9666">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9667">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9667">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9687">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9687">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9688">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9689">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9690">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9691">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9692">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9693">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9694">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9695">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9695">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9696">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9696">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9697">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9697">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9698">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9698">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9699">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9699">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9700">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9700">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9701">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9701">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9702">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9702">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9703">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9703">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9704">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9704">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9705">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9705">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9706">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9706">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9707">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9707">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9731">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9731">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9733">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9733">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9735">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9735">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9736">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9736">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9737">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9737">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9738">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9738">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9739">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9739">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9740">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9740">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9741">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9741">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9742">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9742">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9743">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9743">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9744">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9744">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9745">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9745">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9746">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9746">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9747">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9747">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9748">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9748">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9749">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9749">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9751">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9751">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9752">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9752">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9753">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9753">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9755">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9755">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9756">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9756">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9757">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9757">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9758">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9758">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9759">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9759">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9760">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9760">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9761">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9761">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9762">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9762">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9763">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9763">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9764">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9764">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9765">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9765">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9766">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9766">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9767">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9767">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9768">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9768">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9769">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9769">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9770">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9770">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9771">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9771">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9772">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9772">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9773">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9773">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9774">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9774">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9775">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9775">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9776">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9776">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9777">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9777">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9778">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9778">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9779">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9779">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9780">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9780">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9781">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9781">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9782">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9782">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9783">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9784">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9784">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9785">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9786">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9786">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9787">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9787">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9788">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9788">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9790">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9793">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9793">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9794">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9794">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9796">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9796">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9930">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9930">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9931">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9931">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9932">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9932">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9933">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9933">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9934">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9934">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9935">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9935">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9936">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9936">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9938">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9938">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9939">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9939">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9940">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9940">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9941">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9941">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9942">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9942">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9943">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9943">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9945">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9945">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9947">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9948">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9948">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9949">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9949">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9950">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9950">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9951">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9951">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9970">número nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9970">número nacional identidad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9972">个人标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9972">personal identity no</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9975">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9975">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9976">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9976">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9977">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9978">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9978">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9979">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9980">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9980">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9981">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9981">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9982">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9982">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9983">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9983">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9984">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9985">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9985">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-9986">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-9987">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9987">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9988">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9988">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-9989">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-9989">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10015"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10015">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10016">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10016">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10017">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10018">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10018">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10019">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10020">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10020">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10021">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10021">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10022">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10022">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10023">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10023">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10024">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10024">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10025">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10025">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10026">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10027">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10027">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10028">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10029">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10029">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10030">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10030">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10031">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10031">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10032">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10032">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10033">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10033">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10034">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10034">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10035">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10035">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10036">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10036">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10037">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10037">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10038">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10038">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10039">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10039">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10040">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10040">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10041">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10041">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10042">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10042">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10043">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10043">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10044">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10044">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10045">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10045">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10046">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10046">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10047">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10047">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10048">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10048">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10049">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10049">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10050">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10050">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10051">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10051">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10052">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10052">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10053">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10053">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10054">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10054">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10055">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10055">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10056">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10056">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10057">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10057">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10058">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10058">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10059">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10059">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10060">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10060">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10061">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10061">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10062">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10062">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10063">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10064">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10064">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10065">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10066">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10066">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10067">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10067">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10068">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10068">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10069">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10069">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10070">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10070">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10101">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10101">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10102">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10102">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10103">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10103">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10104">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10104">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10105">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10105">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10106">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10106">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10107">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10107">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10108">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10108">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10109">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10109">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10110">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10110">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10111">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10111">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10112">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10112">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10113">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10113">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10114">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10114">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10115">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10115">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10116">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10116">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10117">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10117">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10118">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10118">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10119">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10119">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10127"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10127">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10128">密码或密码后跟0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 空格和一个星号 ( \* ) --或--------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10128">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10129">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10129">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10130">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10130">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10131">小于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10131">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10132">1-200 个字符的任意组合，这些字符为大写或小写字母、数字、星号 ( \* ) 、连字符 ( ) 、下划线 (_) 或空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10132">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10133">大于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10133">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10134">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10134">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10135"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10135">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>
