## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10147">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10147">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10148">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10148">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10149">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10150">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10150">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10151">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10152">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10152">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10153">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10153">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10154">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10154">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10155">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10155">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10156">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10157">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10157">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10158">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10159">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10160">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10160">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10161">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10161">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10294">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10294">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10295">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10296">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10296">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10297">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10297">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10298">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10298">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10299">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10299">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10300">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10300">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10301">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10301">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10302">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10302">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10303">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10303">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10304">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10304">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10305">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10305">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10306">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10306">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10307">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10307">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10308">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10308">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10309">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10309">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10310">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10310">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10311">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10311">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10312">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10312">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10331">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10331">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10332">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10332">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10333">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10333">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10334">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10334">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10335">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10335">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10336">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10336">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10337">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10338">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10338">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10339">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10340">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10340">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10341">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10341">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10342">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10342">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10343">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10343">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10344">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10344">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10375">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10375">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10376">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10376">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10377">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10377">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10378">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10378">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10379">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10379">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10380">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10380">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10381">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10381">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10382">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10382">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10383">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10383">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10384">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10384">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10385">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10385">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10386">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10387">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10388">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10389">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10390">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10390">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10391">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10391">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10392">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10392">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10393">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10393">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10409">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10409">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10410">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10410">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10411">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10411">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10412">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10412">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10413">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10413">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10414">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10414">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10415">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10415">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10416">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10417">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10417">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10418">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10419">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10419">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10420">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10420">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10421">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10421">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10422">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10422">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10423">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10423">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10424">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10424">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10425">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10425">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10426">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10427">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10427">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10428">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10429">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10430">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10430">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10431">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10431">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10433">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10433">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10459">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10459">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10460">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10460">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10461">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10461">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10462">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10462">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10463">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10463">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10464">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10464">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10465">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10465">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10466">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10466">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10467">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10467">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10468">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10468">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10469">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10470">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10470">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10471">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10472">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10473">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10473">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10474">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10474">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10511">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10511">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10512">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10512">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10513">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10513">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10514">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10514">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10515">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10515">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10516">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10516">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10517">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10517">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10519">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10519">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10520">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10521">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10521">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10522">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10522">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10523">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10523">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10524">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10524">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10525">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10525">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10526">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10526">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10527">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10527">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10528">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10528">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10530">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10532">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10533">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10533">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10534">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10534">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10535">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10535">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10536">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10536">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10557">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10557">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10559">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10559">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10560">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10561">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10561">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10562">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10562">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10563">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10563">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10564">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10564">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10565">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10566">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10566">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10567">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10568">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10568">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10569">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10569">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10570">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10570">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10571">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10571">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10572">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10573">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10573">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10574">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10574">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10591">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10591">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10592">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10592">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10593">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10593">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10594">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10594">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10595">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10595">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10596">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10596">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10597">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10597">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10598">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10598">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10599">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10599">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10600">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10600">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10601">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10602">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10602">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10603">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10604">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10605">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10605">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10606">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10606">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10617">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10617">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10618">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10619">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10619">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10620">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10621">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10621">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10622">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10622">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10623">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10623">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10624">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10625">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10626">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10627">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10628">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10628">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10629">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10629">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10630">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10630">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10631">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10631">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10632">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10632">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10633">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10633">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10634">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10634">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10635">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10635">Identification card</span></span>

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10643">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10643">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10645">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10645">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10647">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10647">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10648">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10648">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10649">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10649">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10650">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10651">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10652">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10653">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10653">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10654">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10654">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10655">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10655">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10656">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10656">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10657">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10657">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10663">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10663">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10664">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10664">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10665">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10665">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10666">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10666">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10667">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10667">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10668">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10668">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10669">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10669">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10670">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10670">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10672">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10672">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10674">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10674">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10675">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10675">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10676">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10676">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10678">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10678">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10685">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10685">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10686">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10686">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10687">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10687">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10688">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10688">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10689">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10689">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10690">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10690">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10691">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10691">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10692">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10692">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10693">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10693">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10694">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10694">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10695">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10695">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10696">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10696">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10697">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10698">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10698">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10699">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10700">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10701">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10701">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10702">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10702">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10703">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10703">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10711">sidecar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10711">sidecar</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10712">tricycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10712">tricycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10713">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10713">motorcycles</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10714">photocard licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10714">photocard licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10715">learner drivers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10715">learner drivers</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10718">driving licences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10718">driving licences</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10719">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10719">driving licence</span></span>

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10721">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10721">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10722">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10722">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10723">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10724">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10724">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10725">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10726">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10726">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10727">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10728">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10728">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10729">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10730">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10731">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10731">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10732">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10732">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10739">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10739">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10740">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10740">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10741">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10742">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10742">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10743">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10744">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10744">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10745">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10745">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10746">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10746">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10747">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10747">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10748">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10748">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10749">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10749">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10750">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10751">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10751">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10752">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10753">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10754">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10754">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10755">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10755">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10756">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10756">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10757">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10757">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10758">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10758">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10759">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10761">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10761">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10762">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10762">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10763">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10763">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10764">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10764">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10765">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10765">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10766">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10766">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10767">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10767">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10768">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10768">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10769">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10769">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10770">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10770">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10771">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10771">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10772">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10772">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10773">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10773">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10774">D. B。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10774">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10775">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10775">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10776">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10776">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10777">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10777">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10778">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10778">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10779">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10779">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10781">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10781">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10783">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10783">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10784"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10784">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10785">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10785">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10786">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10786">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10787">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10787">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10788">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10788">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10789">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10789">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10790">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10790">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10791">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10791">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10792">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10792">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10793">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10793">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10794">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10794">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10795">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10795">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10796">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10796">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10797">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10798">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10798">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10799">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10800">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10801">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10801">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10802">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10802">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10804">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10804">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10826">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10826">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10827">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10827">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10828">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10828">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10829">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10829">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10830">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10830">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10831">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10831">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10832">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10832">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10833">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10833">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10834">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10834">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10835">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10835">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10836">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10836">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10837">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10837">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10838">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10839">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10839">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10840">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10841">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10841">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10842">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10842">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10843">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10843">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10844">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10844">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10845">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10845">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10846">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10846">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10847">税文件</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10847">tax file</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10848">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10848">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10849">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10849">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10850">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10850">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10863">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10863">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10864">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10865">6-17 位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10865">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10867">6-17 连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10867">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10868">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10868">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10869">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10869">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10870">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10870">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10871">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10871">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10872">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10872">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10873">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10873">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10903">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10903">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10904">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10905">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10905">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10906">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10907">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10907">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10908">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10908">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10909">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10909">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10910">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10911">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10911">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-10912">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10913">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10914">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10914">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10915">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10915">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10916">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10916">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-10917">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10917">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10918">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10918">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10919">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10919">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10920">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10920">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-10921">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-10921">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
