## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11019">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11019">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11020">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11020">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11021">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11021">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11022">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11022">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11023">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11023">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11024">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11024">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11025">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11025">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11026">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11026">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11027">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11027">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11028">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11028">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11029">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11029">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11030">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11030">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11031">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11031">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11032">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11032">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11033">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11033">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11034">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11034">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11035">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11035">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11036">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11036">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11037">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11037">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11038">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11038">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11039">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11039">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11040">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11040">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11041">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11041">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11042">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11042">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11043">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11043">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11044">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11044">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11045">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11045">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11046">函数 Func_formatted_itin 或 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11046">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11047">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11047">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11048">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11048">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11049">报税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11049">taxpayer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11051">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11051">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11052">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11052">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11053">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11053">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11054">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11054">ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11060">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11060">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11061"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11061">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11062">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11062">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11063">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11063">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11064">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11064">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11065">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11065">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11066">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11066">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11067">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11067">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11068">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11068">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11069">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11069">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11070">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11070">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11071">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11072">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11072">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11073">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11074">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11074">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11075">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11075">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11076">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11076">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11077">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11077">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11078">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11078">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11079">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11079">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11080">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11080">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11081">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11081">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11082">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11082">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11083">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11083">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11084">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11084">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11085">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11085">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11100">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11100">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11101">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11101">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11102">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11102">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11103">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11103">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11105">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11105">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11106">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11107">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11107">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11108">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11108">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11109">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11109">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11110">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11110">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11111">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11112">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11112">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11113">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11113">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11134">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11134">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11135">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11135">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11136">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11136">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11137">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11137">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11138">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11138">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11139">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11139">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11140">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11140">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11142">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11142">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11143">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11144">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11144">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11145">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11145">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11146">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11146">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11147">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11147">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11148">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11148">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11149">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11149">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11150">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11150">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11159">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11159">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11160">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11161">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11162">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11163">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11164">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11165">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11166">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11167">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11167">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11168">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11169">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11169">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11170">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11170">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11171">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11171">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11173">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11173">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c796b-11175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11176">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11176">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11177">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11177">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11178">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11178">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="c796b-11179">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11179">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="c796b-11184">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c796b-11184">номер паспорта</span></span>
